oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Finnish food chain impacts on climate change
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kurppa, Sirpa
Virtanen, Yrjö
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The evaluation of the food chain’s environmental impacts was conducted using an environmentalaccounting model developed specifically for the Finnish food chain. The model is based on production and environmental impact data from year 2005. The model considers both Finnish production and Finnish imports in addition to their transport. The targets of the evaluation were the environmental impacts, in 2005, stemming from production. Environmental impacts of the end-use phase were not assessed. The changes in inventories were considered according to the national accounting methodology.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kurppa, Sirpa and Virtanen, Yrjö (2010) Finnish food chain impacts on climate change. In: NJF report, vol 6, no 1, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, p. 51.
